articles.description: Sourav Ganguly gave the examples of Sunil Gavaskar, Anil Kumble and Rahul Dravid to talk about different eras of Indian cricket and explain his point. Ganguly said players "play for the pride of representing India".
articles.content: BCCI president Sourav Ganguly said "money can't be related" to the performances of the players. The former India captain gave the examples of Sunil Gavaskar, Anil Kumble and Rahul Dravid to talk abou… [+2347 chars]

articles.author: Arun George
articles.title: Why broadcasters don't mind paying Rs 48,000 crore for IPL - Times of India
articles.description: Sports News: Indian Premier League is a product that is relatively recession proof, says an expert. The league will get a fixed number of eyeballs plus or minus 10

articles.title: Steyn impressed by promising 24-year-old India star, 'Similar to how Rahul bats' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The batter looks like he is ready to face world class fast bowlers and does not look as aggressive as he bats when he is out in the middle.
